title: AFTI ! (Another Font To Identify)
content:
Hello...  
This is my first post here... So, first of all, I like to apologize for my pityful english !  
I'm a French graphic designer and my moronish client send me a 72 dpi rgb awfull jpeg of is logo...  
Need to redraw it !

but the font ?

Can anyone help ?

Lots of thanks...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414014245im_/http:/typophile.com/files/WFI_4463.jpg)
author: romfrom

comments.content:
[Kismet](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414014245/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/kismet/), Linotype's digital version of a typeface cut by John F. Cumming in 1886 for the Boston Typefoundry.  
Don
